review: He understood the problem quite well and advised appropriate medicines. I got fast relief from the distress. Thanks to Dr. Bansal

The doctor heard the entire observation I had for myself and then explained what could be the cause for it. The good part was, he gave me an option of either taking xray immediately or after a week's time citing it didn't seem alarming and hence we can take a week's time. I really appreciate the time he gave and the way he explained the problem and how I can take right measures.
